data.name: One Life
data.detailed_description:
One hit death bullet hell action featuring upgrades, unlockable abilities, minigames, hats and y̴͌ò̷͐ú̷̈́.

- Movement

Fluid movement and dashing, which can of course be upgraded. Your dodging skills will be tested.


- Enemies

Providing a constant stream of obstacles while getting smarter and gaining more attacks incrementally, still perfect for destroying.


- Upgrades

Plenty of upgrades and abilities to buy to try and match your enemies increasing difficulty.


- Minigames and Cosmetics

Purchase cosmetics for your square earned by completing levels and getting highscores in minigames.

- Music

Featuring an original Synthwave soundtrack by Makazi the Hyena.

- Story

no








Ą̸̟̠̭͈͉͎̓̍̃̆R̴̛̜̲̯̩̼̭͖̯̳̺̔̐͠Ȩ̸̳̻͍̻̈́͑͑͆̓́̈́ ̶̳͖̗̱̈́̇́͌̾͗̈́̂̚͠Y̸̠̜͕̹͒Ǒ̴̢̼̯͍̐̂̋̑̊̚̕Ư̸̯̱̻̜̜͇̙̓͗̄͐̈́̏̈́̋̊͜ ̷̦̟̀͗͌̂́W̷̟͚̖̯͈̉͊̀͝H̴̗͎̦͖̙̣̃͌́͗̽̇̒̾͠͝O̶̥͙̿͗͌ ̸̠͎̊͌̅̈́͒̒̎͜Ẏ̷̧̞͔͇͚̳͖͇̪̹̎͒̈́̇̒̈́͆̽͝O̶̯̬̍̀Ų̵̘͇̹̜̼̄͑̔̚͘͜͝ ̷͎͒͑́̚͜T̵̨̡͈̘͎̯̬͍̄̏H̵̯͚̖̼̹̫̓͌͐̅Ì̵̲̭̤̲̺̤̣̥N̶̢̞̤̜̦̈K̴̻̖̩͆̏̅̐̓̉̓͆̚ ̷̢̛̝͚͇͔̯̜͕̅̉͛̃́͜Y̴͚͈̒͐̏̎͊̃̑͛̐͘ͅƠ̴̦͓̲͓̼̣̹̓͂́̽̅͌̕͜͠Ṵ̶̝̹̇͋̔̐̈͐̐ ̴̢̡̛͍͖̟̞̙͙͕̅̈́̑̅̓̊ͅĄ̸̳̖͇̭̺̯̦̜͒̎͋͒͒̀R̷͓̖̠̈́̓̿̌̎̂͊̈́̚͘Ę̷̢̹͇̗̕͠?̵̨̧̠̺̫̮͍̻̭̳̆̂͊̐͆͑͋͘͝
Ḋ̶̘̠̙̈́ͅÓ̴͚̦͎̞̘̭͍̋̃ ̵̡͈̳͕͎͈̣̯̀͊̈́Ŷ̴̨̡̥͍̯̏͗͗̕̚͝ͅŎ̵̬U̸̞̓͛̃̄̏̏̎͘͠ ̷̡̻̉̓Ḵ̸̡͈̯̗̣̽̔̌̈́̾̽̓̎̍̕N̷̡̥̠̘̹͍̭̅̊̍͒̃̇̾̕͝O̵̞̗̘͔͉̺̭̜̟͆̎̄́͘͜W̶̝̙̘̝͖͉͕͈̟̿̉̈́ ̸̧̯̮͉̝͙̾̍̍̓̍͂͘ͅH̴̰͔̤̀̅͒̓̃͝Ŏ̶̻͋̓̐̾W̴̬̥͌̌ ̴̛͙͎̳̰̹͍̈̔͒E̶͉͇̲̓̕V̷͉̱̲̪̲̑͐͑̔Ḙ̴̡͍̗͙͈̓̓̃͂̈́R̵̢̯̞͌͌́̎̃̈́̉͛͘͘Y̴̨̡͎͙̦͔̠̙̙̼̾̐̉̀Ṫ̸̨͇͚͉͇̆̾Ḩ̸͈̠̦̰̄̈́̐͘Ì̸̛͎̭̔̌̾͆͐̏̊̈N̴̰̻̲̙͖̠̩͖̮̜̑̑̾͠Ǵ̴̬̳̤̩̖̰͐͐̚̕ ̴̄́̑͂̀̒͋͜͝Ṣ̴̲̪̬̘̹͔̩̗̾͜T̶̝̰͈͔̲͊A̸̛͓̬̐̐̃R̴̢͈̤̻̮̫̘̻͇͓̈̓T̵̢̳̺͐̉̓̃̋̿̌̈́E̵̡̛͍͙͚͚̼̘͉̫͖̾̇D̶̟̻̹̭̺̞̫̄̆́̅͜?̴̧͔̗̮͙͉̲̝͎́̉̄͌̓̎̑͝
D̴̡̡̡̲̰̻̰͕͇͙̑̑̄͠͝Ǫ̴̡̨̛̘͚̝̝̖̮̈́̎̂̐̀̄͒͜ ̴̯̞̱͖͆̽̈́ͅY̷̧͉͕̦͍̭̟̻͙͂̂̿̂̌́Ő̴̧̳̦U̴̗͚͉̾ ̸̮̿̈́̊̂̍̊̚͘ͅK̵̻̠̼͖̙͐̑̆̽̌̄Ṉ̶̨̢̰͈͗̆̿̅̈́̒Ō̴̢̡͈͕̺̗͉̜̙͆͝ͅW̶̮͚̼̓̌̒̿́͒ ̴̡͇̙͓̩͇̳̆́̇̾̏̊͋̀̕̕Ẁ̵͖̩̬̪̽̽́H̷̳͔̗̩̆̈́̌̈̈́̔̈́̚͘͝Ơ̵̱͕̻̣͙̺͓̓̽̆̅̈́͘ ̵͎̓͐̊̂M̷̙̼̟͋͠A̸̢͖̪̘͇̜̾D̷̲͈̄̉͠Ĕ̷͉̦̦͗̓̇̑̓̿̕̕͝ ̶̢͚̩͕̲̒͝Ỹ̴̠͉̫̹̾̀̓̌̃̿̎̕Ǒ̸̻̤͍Ų̷̖͉̱̞̏͐̌̇?̶́̐͐̈́̐́̈́̎͜
data.about_the_game:
One hit death bullet hell action featuring upgrades, unlockable abilities, minigames, hats and y̴͌ò̷͐ú̷̈́.

- Movement

Fluid movement and dashing, which can of course be upgraded. Your dodging skills will be tested.


- Enemies

Providing a constant stream of obstacles while getting smarter and gaining more attacks incrementally, still perfect for destroying.


- Upgrades

Plenty of upgrades and abilities to buy to try and match your enemies increasing difficulty.


- Minigames and Cosmetics

Purchase cosmetics for your square earned by completing levels and getting highscores in minigames.

- Music

Featuring an original Synthwave soundtrack by Makazi the Hyena.

- Story

no








Ą̸̟̠̭͈͉͎̓̍̃̆R̴̛̜̲̯̩̼̭͖̯̳̺̔̐͠Ȩ̸̳̻͍̻̈́͑͑͆̓́̈́ ̶̳͖̗̱̈́̇́͌̾͗̈́̂̚͠Y̸̠̜͕̹͒Ǒ̴̢̼̯͍̐̂̋̑̊̚̕Ư̸̯̱̻̜̜͇̙̓͗̄͐̈́̏̈́̋̊͜ ̷̦̟̀͗͌̂́W̷̟͚̖̯͈̉͊̀͝H̴̗͎̦͖̙̣̃͌́͗̽̇̒̾͠͝O̶̥͙̿͗͌ ̸̠͎̊͌̅̈́͒̒̎͜Ẏ̷̧̞͔͇͚̳͖͇̪̹̎͒̈́̇̒̈́͆̽͝O̶̯̬̍̀Ų̵̘͇̹̜̼̄͑̔̚͘͜͝ ̷͎͒͑́̚͜T̵̨̡͈̘͎̯̬͍̄̏H̵̯͚̖̼̹̫̓͌͐̅Ì̵̲̭̤̲̺̤̣̥N̶̢̞̤̜̦̈K̴̻̖̩͆̏̅̐̓̉̓͆̚ ̷̢̛̝͚͇͔̯̜͕̅̉͛̃́͜Y̴͚͈̒͐̏̎͊̃̑͛̐͘ͅƠ̴̦͓̲͓̼̣̹̓͂́̽̅͌̕͜͠Ṵ̶̝̹̇͋̔̐̈͐̐ ̴̢̡̛͍͖̟̞̙͙͕̅̈́̑̅̓̊ͅĄ̸̳̖͇̭̺̯̦̜͒̎͋͒͒̀R̷͓̖̠̈́̓̿̌̎̂͊̈́̚͘Ę̷̢̹͇̗̕͠?̵̨̧̠̺̫̮͍̻̭̳̆̂͊̐͆͑͋͘͝
Ḋ̶̘̠̙̈́ͅÓ̴͚̦͎̞̘̭͍̋̃ ̵̡͈̳͕͎͈̣̯̀͊̈́Ŷ̴̨̡̥͍̯̏͗͗̕̚͝ͅŎ̵̬U̸̞̓͛̃̄̏̏̎͘͠ ̷̡̻̉̓Ḵ̸̡͈̯̗̣̽̔̌̈́̾̽̓̎̍̕N̷̡̥̠̘̹͍̭̅̊̍͒̃̇̾̕͝O̵̞̗̘͔͉̺̭̜̟͆̎̄́͘͜W̶̝̙̘̝͖͉͕͈̟̿̉̈́ ̸̧̯̮͉̝͙̾̍̍̓̍͂͘ͅH̴̰͔̤̀̅͒̓̃͝Ŏ̶̻͋̓̐̾W̴̬̥͌̌ ̴̛͙͎̳̰̹͍̈̔͒E̶͉͇̲̓̕V̷͉̱̲̪̲̑͐͑̔Ḙ̴̡͍̗͙͈̓̓̃͂̈́R̵̢̯̞͌͌́̎̃̈́̉͛͘͘Y̴̨̡͎͙̦͔̠̙̙̼̾̐̉̀Ṫ̸̨͇͚͉͇̆̾Ḩ̸͈̠̦̰̄̈́̐͘Ì̸̛͎̭̔̌̾͆͐̏̊̈N̴̰̻̲̙͖̠̩͖̮̜̑̑̾͠Ǵ̴̬̳̤̩̖̰͐͐̚̕ ̴̄́̑͂̀̒͋͜͝Ṣ̴̲̪̬̘̹͔̩̗̾͜T̶̝̰͈͔̲͊A̸̛͓̬̐̐̃R̴̢͈̤̻̮̫̘̻͇͓̈̓T̵̢̳̺͐̉̓̃̋̿̌̈́E̵̡̛͍͙͚͚̼̘͉̫͖̾̇D̶̟̻̹̭̺̞̫̄̆́̅͜?̴̧͔̗̮͙͉̲̝͎́̉̄͌̓̎̑͝
D̴̡̡̡̲̰̻̰͕͇͙̑̑̄͠͝Ǫ̴̡̨̛̘͚̝̝̖̮̈́̎̂̐̀̄͒͜ ̴̯̞̱͖͆̽̈́ͅY̷̧͉͕̦͍̭̟̻͙͂̂̿̂̌́Ő̴̧̳̦U̴̗͚͉̾ ̸̮̿̈́̊̂̍̊̚͘ͅK̵̻̠̼͖̙͐̑̆̽̌̄Ṉ̶̨̢̰͈͗̆̿̅̈́̒Ō̴̢̡͈͕̺̗͉̜̙͆͝ͅW̶̮͚̼̓̌̒̿́͒ ̴̡͇̙͓̩͇̳̆́̇̾̏̊͋̀̕̕Ẁ̵͖̩̬̪̽̽́H̷̳͔̗̩̆̈́̌̈̈́̔̈́̚͘͝Ơ̵̱͕̻̣͙̺͓̓̽̆̅̈́͘ ̵͎̓͐̊̂M̷̙̼̟͋͠A̸̢͖̪̘͇̜̾D̷̲͈̄̉͠Ĕ̷͉̦̦͗̓̇̑̓̿̕̕͝ ̶̢͚̩͕̲̒͝Ỹ̴̠͉̫̹̾̀̓̌̃̿̎̕Ǒ̸̻̤͍Ų̷̖͉̱̞̏͐̌̇?̶́̐͐̈́̐́̈́̎͜
data.short_description: One hit death bullet hell action featuring upgrades, unlockable abilities, minigames, hats and you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 4 Cores, Relatively Recent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 Cores, Relatively Recent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
